title: Devlog #1 - Project Kickoff
description: In this devlog, I talk about the initial steps of the project and my goals for the upcoming months.

title: Devlog #2 - Early Prototyping
description: We’ve started prototyping! I explain the tools I’m using and the first steps of our early development process.

title: Devlog #3 - First Playable Build
description: I share the first playable build and what feedback I’ve received from testers.

title: Devlog #4 - Major Feature Update
description: A detailed breakdown of the new features added and how they change the game.
